data.message: tbh eminem has helped me so much with his music... if i have a bad day his music always makes me happy ... like if you feel the same... and the best rapper ever too live.. love all you stan fans

replies.message: Lol thank just realised l change it
Fack helps you to have a better day? Oo
My favourite song is probably eminem ft yelawolf ..best friend

Lol scares me a lil bit, I thought you meant lose yourself instead of fack, but who am I to tell your favorite song hahaha I like best friend too, and lot of songs from him. I'm just another one proud to be a Stan
Im a proud stan fan i love all his songs really just makes my day when i play his songs
I would love to meet him though
I don't know how I'd react If it happens, I don't even know how to react when I see him on the stage lol
I know same really wouldn't know what to do lol be like a dream come true but he don't come to UK really once that all and i couldn't get a ticket to see him
I think he is tired of doing concerts, really.. He came to Brazil once, and that's the second time he come here, I'm really excited! But I don't think there will be more concerts to go ;(
So sad though he's got so many fans from all round the world i bet he's tired lol so much attention

I agree with u Stan. Eminem's the most talented & biggest artist on the world. He's music... it isn't like an other rappers - without sense. It's a real magic, fantastic beats an' lyrics, always helping with conquering troubles.
